destinations.query: SELECT file_name,file_version,instrument,propid,piname,partner,date_obs,object FROM luci WHERE date_obs >= %s and obstype='CALIBRATION' or obstype='DARK';
destinations.label: MI

destinations.query: SELECT file_name,file_version,instrument,propid,piname,partner,date_obs,object FROM luci WHERE date_obs >= %s and obstype='CALIBRATION' or obstype='DARK';
destinations.label: RM

destinations.query: SELECT file_name,file_version,instrument,propid,piname,partner,date_obs,object FROM lbc WHERE date_obs >= %s and obs_type != 'object';
destinations.label: RM

destinations.query: SELECT file_name,file_version,instrument,propid,piname,partner,date_obs,object FROM mods WHERE date_obs >= %s and imagetyp != 'OBJECT';
destinations.label: MI
